# `EmailSetting` Definition

Email routing settings.

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | Yes | The globally unique identifier for the settings. |
| name | `string` | Yes | The name of the email setting. |
| domains | [`Domains`](domains-definition.md) | No | The domain list settings. |
| selfUri | `string` | No | The URI for this object |
